themes.title: Daytime Anchors
themes.summary: Morning light and caffeine timing shape nighttime sleep quality.

claims.text: Morning light exposure helps anchor the circadian rhythm.
Avoiding caffeine after mid-afternoon can reduce nighttime disturbances.

themes.title: Short Nap Strategy
themes.summary: 10–20 minute power naps reduce sleep pressure without significant sleep inertia.

claims.text: Short naps aid alertness without grogginess when kept under ~20 minutes.
Consistent pre-sleep routine and 18–20°C room temp improve sleep quality.
